overview:
Jack Lahav is a private investor, specializing in launching and growing businesses. Mr. Lahav devotes much of his time to charitable activities, serving as president, as well as, board member of several charities. Previously, Mr. Lahav founded Remarkable Products Inc. and served as its president from 1980 to 1993.

Mr. Lahav was also co-founder of Lamar Signal Processing, Inc.; President of Advanced Technologies, Inc., robotics company and Director of Vocaltech Communications, Inc.

Mr. Lahav served as Chairman of Quigo Technologies from 2001 to 2004 and is currently serving as Chairman of Phoenix Audio Technologies and Doclix Inc.
